thread.section_title: Hotel De Petris - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great located! - Review
thread.title_full: Great located! - Review of Hotel De Petris, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Daniela S
title: Great located! - Review
text:
The hotel is in a perfect location really close to "Fontana di Trevi". Also other important spots of the city (the pantheon, spanish steps....) are real close. There is also a subway station within five minutes of walking.
The breakfast was delicious and variies from day to day. You can also enjoy a real nice city-view from the breakfast location at the rooftop of the hotel at 5th floor!
Hotel is in a good condition and there lots of restaurants, taverns round the corner!
